answer:
The answer is: Ecton, according to the text provided.

Benjamin Franklin was born in Ecton. The historical account states that Josiah Franklin was born there in the same year. The Franklin Institute of Boston is a museum that is part of the Institute for Prospective Technology, which was established by Franklin. The institute is located in Philadelphia and was named after him. He also wrote his autobiography, which was published in 1791.
